name: gatk3_variantannotator
title: GATK3 VariantAnnotator
summary: (Requires a user-provided GATK 3.x jar file). Annotates variants with previoous classifications.

inputSpec.name: inhouse_annotations
inputSpec.label: Inhouse annotation vcf file
inputSpec.help: A vcf file containing the previous classifications of variants.

outputSpec.name: vcf
outputSpec.label: Refined mappings (BAM)
outputSpec.help: A coordinate-sorted BAM file with the refined mappings.
